name: Fightz IO
description:
Fightz IO is a battle royale. Rabbits can be found anywhere, or you can choose to explore in the dangerous land of fire-breathing dragon. There are also different heroes in the game, from basic magic wand to powerful golden excalibur, to destructive flame throwing reaper.

How to Play Fightz.io
Movement
Shoot
Dash

Fights.io Strategy
Kill monsters, take the food (stars) they drop to level up.
